page.title: 16Holidays in Cornwall
page.content: Lots of people come to Cornwall every year for theirnholidays.They like it here because there are lots of beaches and we get quite good weather.People like to sunbathe on the beaches but two months ago some children were playing on the rocks at Penzance and a big wave came and swept them into the sea and four of them were drowned so it can be dangerous. If they don't want to go on the beach there are lots of other places they can go such as Ha'penny Park where you only pay half a penny to get in but you have to pay for anything you want to go on in there.They can go to Helston Aero Park and it's great because they have Moon Buggies and aircraft and a complete village in a big room,just like it was a long time ago.We went to St.Michael's Mount this year for our school trip.It was good.
